config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.title: MumbleLink Config
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.clientAutoL: The action to take when a VoIP server is provided.
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.clientDimen: Multiplier for dimension IDs for a Y-axis offset. Ask your server owner for its value (typically 512).
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.voipServerP: The VoIP server path. Supports templating, see readme.
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.voipServerQ: The VoIP server query. Supports templating, see readme.
